references.reason: This book provides foundational concepts and definitions for uniform circuit complexity classes, crucial for understanding the theoretical limitations of constrained LLM decoding.

references.paper_title: The expressive power of transformers with chain of thought
references.reason: This paper establishes the relationship between the number of layers in LLMs and their capacity to simulate Turing machines, providing a theoretical basis for the study of LLM expressivity.

references.paper_title: GSM-symbolic: Understanding the limitations of mathematical reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces the GSM-symbolic benchmark dataset, which is used in the current paper for evaluating the performance of the proposed CRANE algorithm.

references.paper_title: FOLIO: Natural language reasoning with first-order logic
references.reason: This paper introduces the FOLIO benchmark dataset, which is also used for evaluating the performance of the proposed CRANE algorithm in the current paper.
This paper introduces the IterGen algorithm, which is used as a baseline for constrained LLM decoding and is compared with the proposed CRANE algorithm in the current paper.
